title: Hit the Ground Running
lyrics:
All of us should go and nigga knock who's wit' it?
They will never know or never stop who did it
'Cause we all speed 'em up
Ain't no catchin' up with us at all when we cut
Everybody know the way I rip it sound stunnin'
Nobody stoppin' us when we hit the ground runnin'

Come on!



Feeding you N9na ever since the money was allocated

From T.O.G. and every time I drop people salivated

Venomous vernacular is very vicious and validated

By many people but to the fucking foolish my style is hated

Ain't that a panini that's mad at a weenie

The stabbin' and jabbin' rap and cappin' as bad as cabrini?

I'm one of the critical ones fiendin' for fire foul and formidable from pitiful slums

But I got up and served these suckas my syllables some

Roadrunna this mo gunna's a flow stunna when he get chose by The ho's none of the clothes on her lovin' this soul of a rogue and They want the dough from a platinum and gold negro under one O's number

I'm hand pickin' 'em clarity and the quick in 'em

Stick with the fam, thicker than rarity, never did for them

A chariot with it flickering, flame I hold like Olympian

But a kicker been, I really can't tell if anyone's even listening



I'm not human

Earth is too dense

I dont really wanna be a part of this system, no nothing

Matter better find a place for me, this one malfunctions

Taking off into the universe, I gotta dismount off something

Throw another fuckin' planet toward 'em

'Bout to hit the ground running like



Tell me I ain't got it, you fakin', lyin', hallucinatin'

You get a vibe but do hide your feelings

You're trying to escape 'em

To the rudimentary it's too Da Vinci for you to take in

Hoping that if I do fall eventually parachute don't cave-in

Foolish envy with whom am I miss communicating (uh)

Claiming like I ain't one of the illest, you get a rude awakening

Seen this side of me and then sat in silence recuperating

If you looking to do some hating, figure no use in waiting

I'm forward important spoils of my sport

Cyborg at war winning willling to die for it

On my Thor shit, floor spins in a timewarp

My portions short then I kill and fill my fork (hell yeah!)

Table tippin', the energy got the cable glitchin'

Enter the matrix when I'm blazing, bitch I be Agent Smith

Ain't shit go shifting back and forth don't feel like it's no game of tennis

It's taking human form when I'm morphing homie like wait a minute



I'm not human

Earth is too dense

I dont really wanna be a part of this system, no nothing

Matter better find a place for me, this one malfunctions

Taking off into the universe, I gotta dismount off something

Throw another fuckin' planet toward 'em

'Bout to hit the ground running like



Running like Naruto and needing N9na to throw batons

Baton like Rouge and kill everything with Rittz and, while foes are on

See you people are slowin' on, we be speedin' like motorcross

Please believe it like Ripley, I'm gunnin' like when you quote it wrong

Rockin' o's like I'm Jovi Bon

Got the force, call me Solo Han

I'm the war to you hoes, I'm the dinosaur steppin' on your lawn

Anybody wanna try to keep up with the killer

"I don't even want him", gone

Sick enough to go toe to toe with a crook cause I'm uncoating ya

"And that nigga's from Omaha?"

Told you all that Iso's a god, bitch it's like I switched dimensions and photo bombed [?]

Holy moly, what's goin' on?

What if barely [?]

Open portals when I flow and producers call me Polow The Don

T-tech is soundin' effortless, rhymin' better than most of y'all

You're like designer yes, I be flyer even when clothes are off

Who do I catch now, gotta catch em all like a pokeball

Better follow the protocol, listen homie I told you all that



I'm not human

Earth is too dense

I dont really wanna be a part of this system, no nothing

Matter better find a place for me, this one malfunctions

Taking off into the universe, I gotta dismount off something

Throw another fuckin' planet toward 'em

'Bout to hit the ground running like



Tech N9ne

JL

King ISO

Killer shit

We hoped you enjoyed

Sidenote: There's no-body else fucking with us
